attributes.action: Posthumously award Bill Nicholson a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BIll was the greatest manager that Tottenhem Hotspur ever had and definetly was the most successful but was never knighted so lets get this on.

rejection.details: We are no longer accepting petitions for posthumous honours as they are not possible under the rules. See www.honours.gov.uk/faqs.aspx
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
